resources.string: Free "Grab and Go" meals are available for all New Yorkers. Find a location near you. No registration, ID, or documentation required.
Apply and learn about Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP), also known as Food Stamps.
Get food delivery if you can\'t go outside, have no one who can help you get food, and can\'t afford delivery as a result of COVID-19.
You can pick up food packages at a food pantry or get a meal at a soup kitchen. Find locations near you. No registration, ID, or documentation required
New Yorkers can apply for Unemployment Insurance or Pandemic Unemployment Assistance. Apply today and see if you qualify.
Rental assistance for low-income families and individual adults.
See if you qualify for public assistance, welfare, and emergency cash assistance.
Request financial assistance for funeral expenses.
